summary: Tested advanced date filter system for Contacts module. All 14 features tested and working correctly. The date filter includes 4 modes (Day, Week, Month, Year), calendar picker with Spanish locale, date range selection, and proper filtering of contacts by 'Fecha de creación' column.
critical_code_review_comments: VERIFIED: 'Fecha' button appears in action bar between 'Etiquetas' and 'Campos'
VERIFIED: Date filter dropdown uses React Portal for proper z-index handling
VERIFIED: 4 modes available: Día, Semana, Mes, Año
VERIFIED: Day mode shows 'Desde' and 'Hasta' fields with date pickers
VERIFIED: Calendar uses shadcn/ui Calendar component with Spanish locale (es)
VERIFIED: Week mode shows calendar with week numbers (Sem 1, 2, 3...)
VERIFIED: Month mode shows dropdowns for month+year selection
VERIFIED: Year mode shows grid of years (2022-2030) with multi-select
VERIFIED: getDateFilterRange() correctly calculates date ranges for all modes
VERIFIED: filteredContacts applies date filter on created_at field
VERIFIED: X button on 'Fecha' button clears filter quickly
VERIFIED: Date filter combines with label filters correctly
seed_data_creation: Used existing test data - 2 clients (Carlos Rodríguez, Juano Pérez Test) with dates 05 ene 2026, 2 prospects (spencer zapata salinas with MATRICULADO and NO QUIERE labels) with dates 05 ene 2026
context_for_next_testing_agent: Date filter system is fully functional. The 'Fecha' button opens a dropdown with 4 modes. Day mode uses shadcn Calendar with Spanish locale. Week mode shows week numbers. Month mode has month+year dropdowns. Year mode allows multi-select of years. Filter applies to 'Fecha de creación' column and combines with other filters.

fecha_button_visible.description: Botón 'Fecha' aparece en la barra de acciones entre Etiquetas y Campos

dropdown_with_4_modes.description: Click en botón 'Fecha' abre dropdown con 4 modos: Día, Semana, Mes, Año

day_mode_desde_hasta.description: Modo DÍA: Muestra campos 'Desde' y 'Hasta' con date pickers

day_mode_calendar_opens.description: Modo DÍA: Calendar-picker se abre al hacer clic en 'Seleccionar fecha'

day_mode_date_selection.description: Modo DÍA: Seleccionar fecha actualiza el label del botón

week_mode_numbered_weeks.description: Modo SEMANA: Muestra calendario con semanas numeradas (Sem 1, 2, 3...)

week_mode_row_selection.description: Modo SEMANA: Click en una fila selecciona la semana completa

month_mode_dropdowns.description: Modo MES: Muestra dropdowns Desde (mes+año) y Hasta (mes+año)

year_mode_grid.description: Modo AÑO: Muestra grid de años seleccionables (2022-2030)

year_mode_multiselect.description: Modo AÑO: Permite seleccionar múltiples años

filter_combines_with_labels.description: El filtro de fecha se combina correctamente con filtros de etiquetas

limpiar_button.description: Botón 'Limpiar' en el dropdown limpia el filtro de fecha

x_button_clears_filter.description: X en el botón 'Fecha' limpia el filtro rápidamente

contacts_filtered_by_created_at.description: Los contactos se filtran correctamente por su 'Fecha de creación'

ui_components_verified: 'Fecha' button with CalendarRange icon in action bar
Date filter dropdown with 'Filtrar por fecha' header
Mode selector tabs: Día, Semana, Mes, Año
Day mode: 'Desde' and 'Hasta' fields with 'Seleccionar fecha' buttons
Calendar picker with Spanish locale (enero, febrero, etc.)
Week mode: 'Sem' column with week numbers, days L-M-X-J-V-S-D
Month mode: Month and Year dropdowns for Desde/Hasta
Active filter indicator: 'Filtros activos:' bar above table
X button on 'Fecha' button when filter is active
Date label on button showing selected range (e.g., '5 ene 2026', 'ene 2026', '2026')
